name: webtools-init
description: Project initialization, health checks, registry management, and shared utility agents for the webtools website creation pipeline. Provides 8 commands (/webtools-init, /webtools-init-health, /webtools-init-rebuild, /webtools-init-status, /webtools-init-crawl, /webtools-init-compress, /webtools-init-load, /webtools-init-registry), 4 utility agents (web-crawler, document-compressor, prerequisite-loader, registry-updater), and canonical lifecycle and data model references used by all webtools plugins.
